title: Searge: Minecon将有关于PE API新闻
author: sjjklh

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
标题: Searge: Minecon将有关于PE API新闻There will be news about the API at Minecon. I'll talk about the things I'm working on and what our plans are. But no more details for now.
Minecon将发布关于API的新闻。我将宣布我正在做的和我们计划做的事。现在不公布进一步的细节。




来源：https://twitter.com/SeargeDP/status/764033531223896064


补充：他指的是PE API：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 0431&extra=page%3D1
